author: MarvTheRobot
body:
windows-core.md is out of date with regards .Net Core CLI version being installed by Start-PSBootStrap.

Updated document with correct version number and channel where required.

For more information about the roles of Reviewer and Assignee, refer to CONTRIBUTING.md.

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
This seems like a small (but important) contribution, so no Contribution License Agreement is required at this point. We will now review your pull request.
_Thanks,
Microsoft Pull Request Bot_

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
@MarvTheRobot Thanks for the fix! 

Note that we are ready to migrate to 006195 version with #3887 So I believe we should use this version in docs and hold the PR until #3887 is merged.

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: @MarvTheRobot #3887 is merged. Please update this PR so I can merge it..

comments.author: MarvTheRobot
comments.body: @iSazonov ; thanks, I was about to ask if it had worked as build.psm1 is still using 2.0.0-preview1-005952.

comments.author: MarvTheRobot
comments.body: I'll re-raise this PR after I sort out my fork. I've been playing and broken it all

title: Addresses #3893 - Building PowerShell on Windows - Docs
